// rotational-symmetry variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/7tKBRz ( 727 )
// variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/7lKfzR

#define rot(a)     mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                      // rotation 
#define R(a)       q.x-=1.2, q.xy*=rot(a), q.x+=1.2                  // out-of-axe rotation
#define d(q,n,s)   .04* sin( n *atan(q.z,q.x)+ 10.*iTime + s )       // dents
#define T(s)       t = min(t, max( max( length(q)-1., .9-length(q)) ,  abs(q.y) + d(q,32.,s) -.05 )) // ring
#define g(s)   t = min(t, max( length(q.yz)-.3 -d(q.yxz,12.,s), abs(q.x+.95) -.03 ) ) // satellite gear     

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,s,a;
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -12.*R.y) - R),          // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,20), q,                             // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? 6.*iMouse.xyz/R -3.
              :  vec3( 1,.5,0) * cos(.3*iTime + vec3(0,11,0)); 
    p += sqrt(R.y/18.) * texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(U)%1024,0).x * D; // jitter against pseudo-shading banding
          
    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01 )         // march scene
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(-M.y),                                 // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-M.x-1.57), q.x += 1., 
        q.x-=1.2,
        a = atan(q.y,q.x),
        q.xy = -length(q.xy)*cos( mod( a, 6.28/10. ) + vec2(0,-1.57 ) ), // 10-rotational symmetry
        q.x+=1.2, 
        t=9., s = 1.57 *sign( mod(10.*a/6.28,2.) -1. ),
                T(-s),                                     // ring + its mirror    
        R(.63),  T(s),                                            
        R(-.18), g(s), R(-.3), q.y = -q.y, g(-s),          // satellite gears  

        p += .5*t*D;                                       // step forward = dist to obj          

   O *= O*O*1.5;                                           // color scheme
}
